banner-text.hi-im: A Frontend Developer living in Argentina

aboutme-text.hi-im: I'm creative, self-taught and like collaborative work. I have the ability to adapt to different areas of work and I always seek to develop professionally in areas that challenge me to improve day by day, demonstrating all my skills. To this day I find myself carrying out my own projects and some of the technologies that I have learned and used are : HTML | CSS | JavaScript | React | Redux-toolkit| Git | Github | Tailwind | Gulp.js| npm | yarn | Bootstrap

projects-text-card.sabDeLaTierra: This app is a CRM  created with React.js, Material-UI, Redux and the db was created with C#,.NET and SQLServer
projects-text-card.library-app: This app was built as a group project using the useContext hook and redux-toolkit framework
projects-text-card.Rick-and-Morty: Using the Rick and Morty API and rendering the information in the DOM and there is also a little browser
projects-text-card.BarberApp: Appointment scheduling app created in HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript for beauty salons and hairdressers.
